trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around January 5th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a red glowing, either a ball or oval shaped object the started south ofthe big dipper and very very slowly moved across the sky until it was east. Theobject pulsated inconsistantly. When it got almost completely due east, itseemed to pick up speed and then it went down and blinked on for a bit then offagain inconsistant until it disappeared. Several high flying comercial jets wereseen in the area and I could tell the object was either really really high ormoved real slow because the planes flew real fast compared to the object. Itmoved real slow like a balloon but seem way to red and bright to be one.
Summary: bright red object very slowly moving/going dark an
